name: Plum Health Insurance
description: Plum helps companies care better for their employees by offering insurance and health benefits that are simple, inclusive, and accessible. We eliminate the complexities associated with insurance and make it easy for employees to understand their policies, use their insurance & benefits, and initiate claims. enhanced_description: Plum Health Insurance offers a comprehensive suite of health benefits and insurance products designed to help companies care better for their employees by providing simple, inclusive, and accessible solutions. The platform eliminates complexities, making it easy for employees to understand policies, utilize benefits, and initiate claims. It features a fully-digital platform providing accessible benefits through a single app for insurance, telehealth, and wellness. The service also ensures an effortless claims process with a digital experience from Health IDs to claim initiation and processing, complemented by uninterrupted support from in-app and multilingual experts. Plum is backed by Tiger Global & Peak XV Partners (formerly Sequoia Capital).
